text: @NYGovCuomo Ok ... Post COVID19.. ( Please note I hear ABSOLUTE SILENCE from you regarding China the REAL .. But for of C-19 ) However, the issue the SLASHING of One Billion from a Six billion NYPD budget . You know well the days of “ Fun City “ and Crime in the Big Apple . We play it again!
